mapper.sql: role_id, role_pid, role_name, role_order, role_desc, create_time, update_time, creator, updator
mapper.select:
SELECT sysr.role_id AS roleId, sysr.role_pid AS rolePid, IFNULL(sysri.role_name, "#") AS pRoleName, sysr.role_name AS roleName, sysr.role_order AS roleOrder, sysr.role_code AS roleCode, sysr.create_time AS createTime, sysr.update_time AS updateTime, sysr.creator AS creator, sysuc.user_realName AS creatorName, sysr.updator AS updator, sysuu.user_realName AS updatorName FROM sys_role AS sysr LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sysri ON sysr.role_pid = sysri.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sysuc ON sysr.creator = sysuc.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sysuu ON sysr.updator = sysuu.user_id WHERE 1 = 1
and sysr.role_name like CONCAT('%',#{condition.roleName},'%')
ORDER BY sysr.role_order ASC, sysr.update_time DESC

SELECT sysr1.role_id AS id, sysr1.role_code AS code, sysr2.role_id AS pid, sysr1.role_name AS name FROM sys_role AS sysr1 LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sysr2 ON sysr1.role_pid = sysr2.role_id ORDER BY sysr1.role_order ASC, sysr1.update_time DESC
